definition: eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Ophthalmologist-Tested Formula is tear-free and easy on eyes.
sentences.chinese: 眼科医生测试证明本配方无泪，并且对眼睛没有刺激。

sentences.english: On that Friday I had an eye doctor appointment.
sentences.chinese: 那个周五我和眼科医生有预约。

sentences.english: This patient, who could barely keep her eyelids open, was diagnosed by her eye doctor.
sentences.chinese: 图上眼科医生诊断的这位病人，几乎不能把眼皮睁开。

sentences.english: An optician is qualified to examine your eyes and prescribe glasses.
sentences.chinese: 眼科医生有资格来检查你的眼睛并给你配眼镜。

sentences.english: Ophthalmic surgeons are now performing laser surgery to correct myopia .
sentences.chinese: 眼科医生现在采用激光手术来矫正近视。

sentences.english: They go on to work in labs under the direction of ophthalmologists and optometrists.
sentences.chinese: 学生将来在眼科医生和验光师的指导在实验室工作。

sentences.english: Eye doctors can detect evidence of high blood pressure by looking at the retina.
sentences.chinese: 眼科医生通过查看视网膜可以察觉出高血压的迹象。

sentences.english: After visiting numerous ophthalmologists they all recommended costly medications that I used: none worked.
sentences.chinese: 看了很多眼科医生他们全推荐我用的药品都没有效果。

sentences.english: Esperanto was created by L. L.
sentences.chinese: 世界语是波兰犹太裔眼科医生L。

sentences.english: Bashar went off to become an eye doctor in London.
sentences.chinese: 而巴沙尔则去伦敦当了一名眼科医生。

sentences.english: Check to make sure he doesn't need glasses.
sentences.chinese: 带孩子去看眼科医生，看是否应该给他配眼镜。

sentences.english: See your eye doctor within the first trimester of pregnancy.
sentences.chinese: 在怀孕的前三个月要去看眼科医生。

sentences.english: The laser allows your eye surgeon to flatten the curve of your cornea or make it steeper.
sentences.chinese: 眼科医生用激光把角膜变平或者变陡。

sentences.english: If have eye ministry disease, through oculist cure also can cure.
sentences.chinese: 如果有眼部疾病，通过眼科医生治疗也能治好。

sentences.english: But not all eye doctors have noticed an increase in problems in children.
sentences.chinese: 但是并非所有的眼科医生都有发现儿童视力问题增加。

definition: medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
